title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Blended Weblog-Based Academic Writing Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can systematically organize the logical structure of academic writing using weblogs.
Learners improve the completeness of their academic writing by over 30% through peer feedback integration.
Learners acquire five or more academic writing strategies through individual and collaborative weblog activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
